Welcome to Downtown Columbus

Downtown Columbus is the central business district of Columbus, Ohio. It serves as a hub of activity, offering a unique blend of history, culture, and modernity.

Landmarks and Iconic Buildings

The area boasts some of the city’s most important landmarks, including:

  • The Ohio Statehouse: A symbol of Ohio’s history and governance.
  • The Columbus Museum of Art: Home to an extensive collection of fine arts.
  • The Ohio Theatre: A historic venue hosting world-class performances.

Home to Prominent Businesses

Downtown Columbus is a bustling business district, housing the headquarters of major corporations such as:

  • Nationwide Insurance
  • Huntington Bancshares
  • American Electric Power

A Cultural Hub

The area is also rich in cultural institutions that enhance the city’s vibrant arts scene, including:

  • The Columbus Symphony Orchestra
  • The Columbus Museum of Art
  • The Columbus College of Art and Design (CCAD)

A Neighborhood for Everyone

Downtown Columbus offers something for everyone:

  • For Residents: Modern apartments and condos with easy access to urban amenities.
  • For Professionals: A thriving business environment.
  • For Visitors: A variety of dining, shopping, and entertainment options.

Whether you’re looking for a place to live, work, or play, Downtown Columbus is a dynamic and diverse neighborhood ready to welcome you.
